entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn looks to emit incorrect IL for `nuint -> double` #60714
  • Need telemetry reported for cache-effectiveness for NavTo/FindRefs indices #60710
  • `CSharpSyntaxGenerator.AsInterfaceMember` fails for nested types in interfaces #60708
  • Revise `FindImplementationForInterfaceMember` for abstract statics #60704
  • Add public APIs for FixAll functionality for CodeRefactorings #60703
    Backlog
  • Source generators and different versions of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common #60702
  • Refactor local function from lambda #60701
  • Parsing Error with XML-Style Comments Inside Triple-Slash Documentation #60700
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60696

Closed

  • CS2002 warning can't be treated as an error #60709
    Backlog
  • Crash when params array used with reordered attribute arguments #60572
    17.2
  • `[ReadOnly]Span<T>` fields and properties in a `ref struct` can have a `stackalloc` as a default value #60568
    17.2
  • [PDB][EE] Return Offset in Async Method should not be hidden #60602
  • Tuple type cast in pattern matching becomes a no-op #60699

PullRequests

Created

  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • NRT enable C# EditorFeatures project. #60716
    Area-IDE
  • Support checked operators in explicit interface implementation #60715
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'move to namespace' with file scoped namespaces. #60713
    Area-IDE
  • Improve command-line parsing for linux #60711
    Area-Compilers
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments #60707
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Fix flaky VSTypeScriptHandlerTests #60706
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix FAR on checked operators #60698
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to retrieve options for any language #60697
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Use VS2022 for official build #60712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check val escape for initializers of fields with ref-like type #60577
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge
  • Fix crash when combining reordered arguments with params array #60590
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.2
  • Add TS external access API for ICommentSelectionService #60687
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60695
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • IDE changes for "Unsigned Right Shift" feature, plus tests. #60689
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-ready-for-review
  • Share the indices we create for files that do not have PP directives in them #60693
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Allow generating variable with contextual keyword name in return statements #60684
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Generate static abstract interface members correctly #60618
    Area-IDE
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid formatting diagnostics with raw strings #60655
    Area-Compilers
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Grab bag of UTF8 string support in IDE features #60599
    Area-IDE
  • Stop switching /langver to preview for generator tests #60691
    Area-IDE
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-Compilers
